ComicInfo.Title: Impeach Pedro, Part 3
ComicInfo.Summary:
"IMPEACH PEDRO," PART 3! As the student body turns on Pedro, Napoleon Dynamite must turn a foe into an ally to save his friend. Meanwhile, Uncle Rico is in trouble (like, LEGAL trouble) and only one person can help: Kip Dynamite! But can the flyest Dynamite clear his uncle of murder? Gosh, that's a tall order...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Sara Richard | 1 | B | Cover B | Photo | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Jorge Monlongo | 3 |
